header_text: You send an intentionally bad picture of yourself to your friend over text. They text back saying that they took a screenshot of your photo. Your friend probably thinks that you look awful.

elements.Text: Does your friend think you look good?

elements.name: You send an intentionally bad picture of yourself to your friend over text. They text back saying that they took a screenshot of your photo. Your friend probably thinks that you look awful._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
